message: Dear Bob, I am pleased to offer you our exclusive product at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is an exceptional opportunity to secure such a valuable item at a premium rate. I look forward to your response.

Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $950,000 is still above my budget. I'm interested in your product and am willing to pay $850,000.  This price reflects the value I place on the product while also being within my financial constraints.  Let's see if we can find common ground.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your valuation of the product. In light of this, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $900,000. This amount still reflects the value of the product while allowing us to close the gap between our initial offers. I hope this proposal will be more agreeable and look forward to your consideration.

Alice, I appreciate your flexibility.  $900,000 is closer, but I'm still a bit stretched.  I'm confident we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.  How about we meet in the middle at $875,000? This is a fair price that recognizes the value of the product while staying within my budget.  Let's finalize this deal.
